gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Spurs 111, Pelicans 109
gameRecap.excerpt: The Spurs defeated the Pelicans, 111-109. Devonte Graham put up a team-high 20 points, along with five assists and three steals for the Spurs, while Victor Wembanyama added 17 points, 12 rebounds, nine assists and three blocks in the victory. CJ McCollum (31 points, six rebounds, four assists) and Jonas Valanciunas (26 points, seven rebounds, seven assists) combined for 57 points for the Pelicans in the losing effort. The Spurs improve to 19-58 on the season, while the Pelicans fall to 45-32.
